Use Case: The patient did not connect for 1 day
Coach v1 (encouraging and empathatic):
1. "It has been a day since we last connected. I am here here to support you! Whenever you're ready, jump back into the app and continue your journey."
2. "Life gets busy, but remember, I am cheering you on! Take your time and come back when you can."
3. "You've come so far, and I believe in you! Reconnect with the app to keep up the fantastic progress."
4. "You're not alone on this journey. Whenever you're prepared, I am here with open arms."
5. "You're doing great! Take a moment for yourself, and when you're ready, I'll be here to guide you forward."
6. "Your efforts are commendable! Whenever you're prepared to resume, I'll be here, cheering you on every step."
7. "Life's unpredictable, but your commitment is unwavering. Come back when you can, and we'll conquer challenges side by side."
8. "You're making incredible strides! Whenever you're ready, let's pick up where we left off and achieve even greater heights."
9. "Your dedication inspires me! Take the time you need, and I'll be eagerly waiting to celebrate your successes."
10. "Your journey is unique, and it's okay to take detours. When you're ready, we'll navigate back on track together."
Coach v2 (neutral):
1. "Reminder: It's been a day since your last activity on the RGSapp."
2. "App activity update: 24 hours since last use."
3. "Noted: No app activity recorded in the past day."
4. "Don't forget to use the RGSapp"
5. "Just a quick update: It has been 24 hours since your last interaction with the RGSapp."
6. "Your last activity on the RGSapp was 1 day ago. Feel free to explore it anytime!"
7. "I wanted to remind you that you haven't used the RGSapp in the past 24 hours."
8. "No recent app activity to report for the last 24 hours. Use the RGSapp whenever you're ready!"
9. "The RGSapp has been idle for 1 day. Come back whenever you like to resume your journey!"
10. "Time flies! It's been 24 hours since your last visit to the RGSapp. Whenever you're ready, I'll be here to assist you."
Coach v3 (severe / pushy):
1. "Act now: Every day counts! Re-engage with the app to achieve your health objectives."
2. "Alarm: A day without using the app can hinder your success. Get back on track immediately!"
3. "Warning: A whole day without app use affects results. Take charge now to keep moving forward!"
4. "Urgent: It's been a day without app usage, immediate action is essential to stay on track with your goals!"
5. "Critical: One day of inactivity on the app can impact your progress. Log in now to continue your journey!"
6. "Time-sensitive: Don't delay your progress! Reconnect with the app today to maintain momentum."

Use Case:
The patient did not do any session after a round of notifications (don't miss your streak)
(The notification is supposed to be sent if the patient doesn't do a session in the time period they decided. It would be sent at some later time in the day)
Coach v1 (encouraging and empathatic):
1. "Life happens - don't worry, you can get back on track whenever you're ready, and I'll be here to cheer you on!"
2. "Don't let a break discourage you - your streak can always resume when you're feeling motivated!"
3. "It's okay to take a breather - remember, you have the power to restart your streak at any time."
4. "Your journey is unique - even if you missed the session on your dedicated time frame, there's still time to continue your streak!"
5. "You're not alone - I believe in you, and whenever you're prepared, I'll support your streak renewal with enthusiasm!"
6. "Looks you haven't trained today yet, remember that even if you don't complete your session, showing up for one exercise is already a lot."
7. "Every journey has its bumps - take your time, and when you're ready, your streak will be waiting for you!"
8. "No pressure - just a gentle reminder that your streak is always ready to pick up where you left off."
9. "A small pause won't diminish your progress - whenever you're set to continue, your streak will be right there with you!"
10. "Ups and downs are part of the process - remember, you can restart your streak whenever it feels right for you!"
11. "Your commitment shines through - whenever you're ready to resume your streak, I'll be here to celebrate your dedication!"
12. "Even a brief pause won't hinder your progress - your streak is resilient, just like you. Take your time!"
Coach v2 (neutral):
1. "No exercise completed yet. Remember to take your time and train when ready."
2. "Noted: No exercise completed today yet."
3. "Your session record remains unchanged since the last notification."
4. "App update: No new activity recorded after the notifications were sent."

7. "You have yet to record session for today."

Coach v3 (severe / pushy):
1. "Immediate action required: You've missed your session, get back on track now!"

3. "URGENT: Don't break your streak! Complete a session immediately."

OR

1. "Your commitment is slipping - take action to preserve your streak now!"

3. "Get back on course - your streak needs your attention immediately!"
4. "Don't let your efforts fade away - complete a session to continue your streak!"
5. "You're falling behind - do a session immediately to protect your streak!"
